title: Why there are no reviews here
review: I don't think anyone managed to get past the first 10 minutes of the film. I understood what the movie is about, nothing original, but at least it could have been interesting, but when I saw the poor quality of sets and acting, I decided I have other things more important to do with my life.

title: I know you are cheating.
review:
Several couples are given a drug to help release misconceptions, but only creates conflicts and distrusts in their relationships. Someone is killed and the drug company is investigated. The story is flash backs of the various couples.

This is drama-soap opera stuff. This is not the fantasy, sci-fi film as billed. And not really a mystery, as we know someone dies. Acting and dialogue put me to sleep. It is intended to be some sort of statement on human drug testing, but grossly misses the mark.
